Body:
with mock.patch(dbapi.__name__ + '.connect') as mock_connect:
    b = Database(dbapi=dbapi, **credentials)
    assert b._is_connected() is False
with mock.patch(dbapi.__name__ + '.connect') as mock_connect:
    b = Database(dbapi=dbapi, **credentials)
    b.connect()
    assert b._is_connected() is True
b = Database(dbapi=dbapi, **credentials)
del b.conn
assert b._is_connected() is False
pytest.mark.parametrize('dbapi', DBAPIS)
